data.Name: Transaction Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Transaction Type. Text
data.Description: Captures information regarding movements and adjustments.  Movement types may include: receipt, shipment, transfer, return, moved to production, moved from production. Quantity adjustment types may include: physical count adjustment, damage, obsolete, scrapped. Cost adjustments may include: lower of cost or market realization.

data.Name: Transaction Type System
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Transaction Type System. Text
data.Description: Transaction code local to the underlying accounting software system.

data.Name: Transaction Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Transaction Description. Text
data.Description: Description of the transaction.

data.Name: Transaction Quantity
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Transaction_ Quantity. Quantity
data.Description: Quantity affected expressed in location stocking organization in Basic_UOM_Code. When the inventory is received, the number involved will be a 'positive number'; when the inventory is dispatched, the number involved will be a 'negative number'.

data.Name: Supplier Account ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Supplier Account ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the supplier. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the Supplier_Account_ID in the BAS_Supplier table.

data.Name: Customer Account ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Customer Account ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the receiving customer. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the Customer_Account_ID in the BAS_Customer table.

data.Name: Inventory Document ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Document ID. Code
data.Description: The unique identifier for the inventory document, specifying the sources where inventory originates. Typically auto-generated by the system.

data.Name: Inventory Document Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Document Number. Text
data.Description: The number of the inventory document. The number is usually generated by manual input or is system generated; for example, '201305020001'.

data.Name: Inventory Document Line ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Document Line ID. Code
data.Description: The unique identifier for the inventory document line. Typically auto-generated by the system.

data.Name: Inventory Document Line Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Document Line Number. Text
data.Description: The number of the inventory document line. This number is either generated by manual input or generated by the system.

data.Name: Status
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Status. Code
data.Description: The status of the inventory document; for example, 'new', 'save', 'submit', 'void' and 'frozen'.

data.Name: Inventory Organization Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Organization Code. Identifier
data.Description: The code of the inventory organization. Shall match the Business_Segment_Code in the BAS_Business_Segment table. Inventory Organization refers to the organizational unit, physical or virtual, where the inventory transaction and balances may be tracked and monitored. It provides inventory information to modules like purchase and sales. The simplest form of inventory organization is warehouse.

data.Name: Inventory Stocking UOM Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Stocking_ . (Component of Quantity)
data.Description: The code of the measurement unit used associated with the quantity used for stocking inventory. Shall match the UOM_Code in the BAS_Measurement_Unit table.

data.Name: Inventory Costing UOM Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Costing_ . (Component of Quantity)
data.Description: The code of the measurement unit for inventory's cost. Shall match the UOM_Code in the BAS_Measurement_Unit table.

data.Name: Inventory Product ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Product ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the inventory item. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the Inventory_Product_ID in the INV_Product table.

data.Name: Lot Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Lot Number. Text
data.Description: The number associated with a product that is used for tracking and managing the lot.

data.Name: Serial Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Serial Number. Text
data.Description: The number associated with an individual product item that is used for tracking and managing (e.g. a company purchases 10 computers, with each computer be assigned a individual serial number).

data.Name: Inventory Required By
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Required By. Text
data.Description: The person or organization that makes requisition for inventory.

data.Name: Inventory From Location ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory From Location ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the stock trading source location. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the Location_ID in the INV_Location table.

data.Name: Inventory To Location ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory To Location ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the stock trading destination. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the Location_ID in the INV_Location table.

data.Name: Cost Organization Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Cost Organization Code. Identifier
data.Description: The code of the cost organization, which refers to the organizational unit/level where the cost of outbound inventory will be calculated. The calculation may be done at the corporate level, the stocking organization level or at the particular locations where inventory is stored. Shall match the Business_Segment_Code in the

data.Name: Inventory Cost
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory_ Cost. Amount
data.Description: Cost per unit using the method found in field Inventory_Cost_Method.

data.Name: Transaction Adjustment Cost
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Transaction Adjustment_ Cost. Amount
data.Description: Per unit increase or decrease in stocking cost as represented in field Inventory_Cost_Method of the INV_On_Hand table.

data.Name: Functional Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Functional_ Currency Code. (Component of Code)
data.Description: The code of  functional or group currency related to the balance (ISO 4217). Shall match the Currency_Code in the BAS_Currency table.

data.Name: INV System Or External Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. INV System Or External Source. Code
data.Description: Indicator used to show whether the inventory transaction is originated within or outside the inventory module.  I for internally initiated transaction and  E  for externally initiated one, for example, purchase or sale.

data.Name: INV Received And Dispatched Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Inventory Received And Dispatched Code. Code
data.Description: This indicates whether the inventory is received or dispatched. For example 0 means inventory received,  1 means  inventory dispatched.

data.Name: GL Line Debit Account ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Line_ Defined.
data.Description: The GL account number on which the debit side of the transaction has been posted. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_Of_Accounts table.

data.Name: GL Line Credit Account ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Line_ Defined.
data.Description: The GL account number on which the credit side of the transaction has been posted. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_Of_Accounts table.

data.Name: Approved
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. was. Approved_ Handling

data.Name: Created
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. was. Created_ Handling

data.Name: Last Modified
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. was. Last Modified_ Handling

data.Name: Posted Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. was. Posted_ Handling

data.Name: Business Segment X
data.DictionaryEntryName: Inventory Transaction_ List. Defned. X_ Business Segment
data.Description: A reserved field that shall be used for business segments / structures. The 'X' signifies an organizational level. Each number used to replace the 'X' is associated with each unique reference level. For example, division, department, business unit, purchasing organization, project or legal entity.

data.Name: Addition ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. ID
data.Description: The unique identifier for the addition entry. Typically auto-generated by the system.

data.Name: PPE ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. PPE ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the PPE. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the PPE_ID in the PPE_Master table.

data.Name: Fiscal Year
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Fiscal Year. Year_ Identifier
data.Description: Fiscal year in which the Addition_Date occurs. The year shall be shown in four digits as 'YYYY', which is part of the extended format and the 'YYYY-MM-DD' in ISO 8601-1. Shall match the Fiscal_Year in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Accounting Period
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Accounting Period. Period_ Identifier
data.Description: Accounting period in which the Addition_Date occurs. Examples include W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-12 for monthly periods, Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods, and from any beginning date to any ending date. Shall match the Accounting_Period in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Tag Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Tag Number. Text
data.Description: The tag was commonly used when there was no ERP system to record PPE's state of the whole lifespan. Nowadays, some ERP systems still follow to use it in the business of PPE. The number is usually generated by manual input or is system generated; for example, when there is a PPE, a tag is created correspondingly. And each tag contains either one PPE or several PPEs. However, each PPE has its own PPE_ID as a unique identifier. If a tag only has one PPE, the PPE_ID is the same as the Tag_Number.

data.Name: Addition Type Name
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Addition Type Name. Text
data.Description: Description of the addition type; for example, purchase, invest and donate.

data.Name: Addition Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Addition. Date
data.Description: The date that addition transaction happens.

data.Name: Addition Reason
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Addition Reason. Text
data.Description: The reason why the PPE is added.

data.Name: Addition Quantity
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Addition_ Quantity. Quantity
data.Description: The quantity of PPE to be added.

data.Name: Original Cost
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Original_ Cost. Amount
data.Description: Original cost of PPE.

data.Name: Functional Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Functional_ Currency Code. (Component of Code)
data.Description: The code of  functional or group currency related to the balance (ISO 4217). Shall match the Currency_Code in the BAS_Currency table.

data.Name: Approved
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. was. Approved_ Handling

data.Name: Created
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. was. Created_ Handling

data.Name: Last Modified
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. was. Last Modified_ Handling

data.Name: Business Segment X
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Addition_ List. Defned. X_ Business Segment
data.Description: A reserved field that shall be used for business segments / structures. The 'X' signifies an organizational level. Each number used to replace the 'X' is associated with each unique reference level. For example, division, department, business unit, purchasing organization, project or legal entity.

data.Name: Change ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. ID
data.Description: The unique identifier for the change entry. Typically auto-generated by the system.

data.Name: PPE ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. PPE ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the PPE. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the PPE_ID in the PPE_Master table.

data.Name: Fiscal Year
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Fiscal Year. Year_ Identifier
data.Description: Fiscal year in which the Change_Date occurs. The year shall be shown in four digits as 'YYYY', which is part of the extended format and the 'YYYY-MM-DD' in ISO 8601-1. Shall match the Fiscal_Year in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Accounting Period
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Accounting Period. Period_ Identifier
data.Description: Accounting period in which the Change_Date occurs. Examples include W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-12 for monthly periods, Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods, and from any beginning date to any ending date. Shall match the Accounting_Period in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Tag Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Tag Number. Text
data.Description: The tag was commonly used when there was no ERP system to record PPE's state of the whole lifespan. Nowadays, some ERP systems still follow to use it in the business of PPE. The number is usually generated by manual input or is system generated; for example, when there is a PPE, a tag is created correspondingly. And each tag contains either one PPE or several PPEs. However, each PPE has its own PPE_ID as a unique identifier. If a tag only has one PPE, the PPE_ID is the same as the Tag_Number.

data.Name: Change Type Name
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Change Type Name. Text
data.Description: The type of change transaction, except for addition or removal transactions. Examples of type of change include revaluations, changes in historical cost, changes in depreciation method, transfers and changes in status.

data.Name: Change Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Change. Date
data.Description: The date when the changing transaction happens.

data.Name: Change Reason
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Change Reason. Text
data.Description: The reason why the changing transaction happens.

data.Name: Content Before Change
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Content Before Change. Text
data.Description: The content; for example, the method, amount or quantity before changing transaction.

data.Name: Content After Change
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Content After Change. Text
data.Description: The content; for example, the method, amount or quantity after changing transaction.

data.Name: Approved
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. was. Approved_ Handling

data.Name: Created
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. was. Created_ Handling

data.Name: Last Modified
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. was. Last Modified_ Handling

data.Name: Business Segment X
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Change_ List. Defned. X_ Business Segment
data.Description: A reserved field that shall be used for business segments / structures. The 'X' signifies an organizational level. Each number used to replace the 'X' is associated with each unique reference level. For example, division, department, business unit, purchasing organization, project or legal entity.

data.Name: Department Allocation ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Department Allocation_ List. ID

data.Name: PPE ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Department Allocation_ List. PPE ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the PPE. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the PPE_ID in the PPE_Master table.

data.Name: Depreciation Allocation Proportion
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Department Allocation_ List. Depreciation Allocation Proportion. Percentage
data.Description: The depreciation allocation proportion of each department.

data.Name: Department Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Department Allocation_ List. Department Code. Identifier
data.Description: The code of department rosters; for example, the department name is IT department, the code is 0018. Shall match the Busieness_Segment_Code in the BAS_Business_Segment table.

data.Name: Business Segment X
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Department Allocation_ List. Defned. X_ Business Segment
data.Description: A reserved field that shall be used for business segments / structures. The 'X' signifies an organizational level. Each number used to replace the 'X' is associated with each unique reference level. For example, division, department, business unit, purchasing organization, project or legal entity.

data.Name: PPE Depreciation ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. ID

data.Name: PPE ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. PPE ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the PPE. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match a PPE_ID in the PPE_Master table.

data.Name: Fiscal Year
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Fiscal Year. Year_ Identifier
data.Description: Fiscal year in which the Created_Date occurs. The year shall be shown in four digits as 'YYYY', which is part of the extended format and the 'YYYY-MM-DD' in ISO 8601-1. Shall match the Fiscal_Year in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Accounting Period
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Accounting Period. Period_ Identifier
data.Description: Accounting period in which the Entered_Date occurs. Examples include W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-12 for monthly periods, Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods, and from any beginning date to any ending date. Shall match the Accounting_Period in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Depreciation Method ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Depreciation Method ID. Identifier
data.Description: The field is used to specify the depreciation method. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the Depreciation_Method_ID in the PPE_Depreciation_Method table.

data.Name: Useful Life
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Useful Life. Numeric
data.Description: Total useful life of PPE in months.

data.Name: Useful Life Remaining
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Useful Life Remaining. Numeric
data.Description: Remaining useful life of PPE in months as of the report date.

data.Name: Original Cost
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Original_ Cost. Amount
data.Description: Original cost of PPE.

data.Name: Residual Value
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Residual_ Value. Amount
data.Description: Residual value of PPE as of the report date. Mostly it is calculated through an expected residual value ratio.

data.Name: Depreciable Basis
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Depreciable_ Basis. Amount
data.Description: Depreciable basis of PPE, which shows the difference between original cost and residual value.

data.Name: Depreciation Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Depreciation Amount. Amount
data.Description: The amount of the depreciation recognized during the period.

data.Name: Accumulated Depreciation
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Accumulated_ Depreciation. Amount
data.Description: The accumulated depreciation of PPE as of the report date.

data.Name: Carrying Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Carrying Amount. Amount
data.Description: The carrying amount of PPE as of the report date, which shows the difference between original cost and accumulated depreciation.

data.Name: Depreciation Account Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Specified. Depreciation_ Chart Of Accounts
data.Description: The GL account number on which Income Statement amount is recognized for depreciation. This number is generated either by manual input or generated by the system. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_of_Accounts table.

data.Name: Accumulated Depreciation Account Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Specified. Accumulated Depreciation_ Chart Of Accounts
data.Description: The GL account number on which Balance Sheet amount is recognized for accumulated depreciation. This number is generated either by manual input or by the system. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_of_Accounts table.

data.Name: Approved
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. was. Approved_ Handling

data.Name: Created
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. was. Created_ Handling

data.Name: Last Modified
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. was. Last Modified_ Handling

data.Name: Business Segment X
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation_ List. Defned. X_ Business Segment
data.Description: A reserved field that shall be used for business segments / structures. The 'X' signifies an organizational level. Each number used to replace the 'X' is associated with each unique reference level. For example, division, department, business unit, purchasing organization, project or legal entity.

data.Name: Depreciation Method ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation Method_ List. ID
data.Description: The unique identifier for different depreciation methods. Typically autogenerated by the system.

data.Name: Depreciation Method Name
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation Method_ List. Depreciation Method Name. Text
data.Description: The name of the depreciation method, for example, depreciation by straight-line method, double-declining-balance depreciation method.

data.Name: Depreciation Method Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation Method_ List. Depreciation Method Description. Text
data.Description: Description associated with the method.

data.Name: Depreciation Formula
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation Method_ List. Depreciation Formula. Text
data.Description: The basic formula to calculate the depreciation.

data.Name: Business Segment X
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Depreciation Method_ List. Defned. X_ Business Segment
data.Description: A reserved field that shall be used for business segments / structures. The 'X' signifies an organizational level. Each number used to replace the 'X' is associated with each unique reference level. For example, division, department, business unit, purchasing organization, project or legal entity.

data.Name: PPE ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. ID
data.Description: The unique identifier for the PPE. Typically auto-generated by the system.

data.Name: PPE Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. PPE Code. Text
data.Description: The internal code of PPE at the local level.

data.Name: Tag Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Tag Number. Text
data.Description: The tag was commonly used when there was no ERP system to record PPE's state of the whole lifespan. Nowadays, some ERP systems still follow to use it in the business of PPE. The number is usually generated by manual input or is system generated; for example, when there is a PPE, a tag is created correspondingly. And each tag contains either one PPE or several PPEs. However, each PPE has its own PPE_ID as a unique identifier. If a tag only has one PPE, the PPE_ID is the same as the Tag_Number.

data.Name: Type Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Type Code. Identifier
data.Description: The unique code of the PPE type. Shall match the Type_Code in the PPE_ Type table.

data.Name: PPE Name
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. PPE Name. Text
data.Description: The name of the PPE.

data.Name: PPE Feature
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. PPE Feature. Text
data.Description: The feature is used to specify the PPE more clearly, for example, the brand, color, size and configuration.

data.Name: Bar Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Bar Code. Text
data.Description: Universal Product Code or other external code, for example, the product code from a primary supplier.

data.Name: Purchase Order ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Purchase Order ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the purchase order. Typically auto-generated by the system. May be set to NULL if the PPE is not generated from a purchase order. Otherwise shall match the Purchase_Order_ID in the PUR_Order_Details table.

data.Name: Inventory Product ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Inventory Product ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the inventory item. Typically auto-generated by the system. May be set to NULL if the PPE is not generated from inventory. Otherwise shall match the Inventory_Product_ID in the INV_Product table.

data.Name: Serial Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Serial Number. Text
data.Description: The number associated with an individual PPE that is used for tracking and managing (e.g. a company purchases 10 computers, with each computer be assigned a individual serial number).

data.Name: Lot Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Lot Number. Text
data.Description: The number associated with a PPE that is used for tracking and managing the lot.

data.Name: Manufacturer
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Manufacturer. Text
data.Description: Manufacturer of the PPE.

data.Name: Supplier Account ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Supplier Account ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the supplier. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the Supplier_Account_ID in the BAS_Supplier table.

data.Name: Location Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Location Description. Text
data.Description: Description of the location where the PPE is placed.

data.Name: Condition Name
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Condition Name. Text
data.Description: The name of various usage status of PPE, for example, asset in-use, not-in-use and not-in-use for seasonal reasons.

data.Name: Acquisition Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Acquisition. Date
data.Description: Date that the PPE is acquired.

data.Name: Posted Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Posted. Date
data.Description: Date when PPE is posted into accounts.

data.Name: Placed Into Service Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Placed Into Service. Date
data.Description: Date that PPE is placed into use.

data.Name: Quantity On Hand
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. On Hand_ Quantity. Quantity
data.Description: Quantity of PPE items on hand.

data.Name: a
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. . (Component of Quantity)
data.Description: The code of measurement unit for measuring the quantity of the PPE. Shall match the UOM_Code in the BAS_Measurement_Unit table.

data.Description: Total useful life of PPE in months.

data.Name: Useful Life Remaining

data.Description: Remaining useful life of PPE in months as of the report date.

data.Description: Original cost of PPE.

data.Name: Residual Value
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Residual_ Value. Amount
data.Description: Residual value of PPE as of the report date. This value is typically calculated by an expected residual value ratio.

data.Name: Accumulated Depreciation
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Master_ List. Accumulated_ Depreciation. Amount
data.Description: The accumulated depreciation of PPE as of the report date.

data.Name: Impairment Provision

data.Description: The impairment provision of PPE as of the report date.

data.Name: Net Book Value

data.Name: Replacement Cost

data.Name: Fair Value

data.Name: Removal ID

data.Description: Fiscal year in which the Removal_Date occurs. The year shall be shown in four digits as 'YYYY', which is part of the extended format and the 'YYYY-MM-DD' in ISO 8601-1. Shall match the Fiscal_Year in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Accounting Period
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Accounting Period. Period_ Identifier
data.Description: Accounting period in which the Removal_Date occurs. Examples include W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-12 for monthly periods, Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods, and from any beginning date to any ending date. Shall match the Accounting_Period in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Tag Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Tag Number. Text
data.Description: The tag was commonly used when there was no ERP system to record PPE's state of the whole lifespan. Nowadays, some ERP systems still follow to use it in the business of PPE. The number is usually generated by manual input or is system generated; for example, when there is a PPE, a tag is created correspondingly. And each tag contains either one PPE or several PPEs. However, each PPE has its own PPE_ID as a unique identifier. If a tag only has one PPE, the PPE_ID is the same as the Tag_Number.

data.Name: Removal Type Name
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Type Name. Text
data.Description: Description of the removal type; for example, sale, retirement, disposal or damaged.

data.Name: Removal Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Date. Date
data.Description: The date that PPE is removed.

data.Name: Removal Reason
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Reason. Text
data.Description: The reason why there is a removal.

data.Name: Removal Quantity
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal_ Quantity. Quantity
data.Description: The reduced quantity of PPE.

data.Name: Removal Original Cost
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Original_ Cost. Amount
data.Description: The reduced original cost during the removal transaction.

data.Name: Removal Accumulated Depreciation
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Accumulated_ Depreciation. Amount
data.Description: The reduced accumulated depreciation during the removal transaction.

data.Name: Removal Impairment Provision
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Impairment_ Provision. Amount
data.Description: The reduced impairment provision during the removal transaction.

data.Name: Removal Residual Value
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Residual_ Value. Amount
data.Description: The reduced residual value during the removal transaction.

data.Name: Removal Cash Proceeds Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Cash Proceeds Amount. Amount
data.Description: The amount of cash proceeds received from the removal transaction.

data.Name: Removal Non Cash Proceeds Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal Non Cash Proceeds Amount. Amount
data.Description: The amount of non-cash proceeds received from the removal transaction.

data.Name: Removal Expense
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Removal_ Expense. Amount
data.Description: The expense generated from the removal transaction.

data.Name: Unrealized Gain Loss Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Unrealized Gain Loss Amount. Amount
data.Description: Amount of unrealized gain/loss recorded on the Balance Sheet of removal transaction.

data.Name: Realized Gain Loss Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Realized Gain Loss Amount. Amount
data.Description: Amount of realized gain/loss recorded on the Income Statement related to the removal transaction.

data.Name: Functional Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Functional_ Currency Code. (Component of Code)
data.Description: The code of  functional or group currency related to the balance (ISO 4217). Shall match the Currency_Code in the BAS_Currency table.

data.Name: Unrealized Gain Loss ACC NUM
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Unrealized Gain Loss_ Account Number.
data.Description: The GL account number on which Balance Sheet amount is recorded for unrealized gain/loss. This number is either generated by manual input or generated by the system. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_of_Accounts table.

data.Name: Realized Gain Loss Account NUM
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Realized Gain Loss_ Account Number.
data.Description: The GL account number on which Income Statement amount is recognized for realized gain/loss. This number is either generated by manual input or generated by the system. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_of_Accounts table.

data.Name: Approved
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. was. Approved_ Handling

data.Name: Created
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. was. Created_ Handling

data.Name: Last Modified
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. was. Last Modified_ Handling

data.Name: Business Segment X
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Removal_ List. Defned. X_ Business Segment
data.Description: A reserved field that shall be used for business segments / structures. The 'X' signifies an organizational level. Each number used to replace the 'X' is associated with each unique reference level. For example, division, department, business unit, purchasing organization, project or legal entity.

data.Name: Type Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Type_ List. ID
data.Description: The unique code of letters and/or numbers used to represent or identify a PPE type. For instance, using 0201 to represent Manufacturing Equipment, using 0202 to represent Working Equipment.

data.Name: Type Name
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Type_ List. Type Name. Text
data.Description: The name of the type categorized by the PPE attributes, for example, land, buildings, machinery and equipment.

data.Name: Parent Type ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: PPE Type_ List. Parent Type ID. Identifier
data.Description: The unique identifier for the parent PPE type. Typically auto-generated by the system. Shall match the Type_ID in the PPE_Type table.
